Posts.Content: Not good, my tumour has started to grow again and now they're saying it's incurable.
Posts.Title: How much more can they throw at me??

Posts.Content: Hi, I've been having a rough time and really starting to feel it now. I'm just wondering if anyone has had similar experiences? I've written my story on my profile xxx
Posts.Title: How much more can they throw at me??

Posts.Content: Aww sorry didn't want to upset people. I don't think I would have wanted a line in, the thought of having something in my vein the whole time would make me feel sick. I seem to heal great for a week or so then my wounds open again or I get another infection. I'm being treated at ninewells hospital in Dundee Scotland. Thanks for the hug kacang
Posts.Title: How much more can they throw at me??

Posts.Content: Hi boobarama  Chemo sucks! Yeah the steroids are supposed to help but they made me feel worse than the chemo. As soon as they were out of my system I felt so much better but dreaded the next time I had too take them. Thanks, I hope chemo isn't to rough for you xxx
Posts.Title: How much more can they throw at me??

Posts.Content: Hi gay I've already had chemo which shrunk the tumours but it can't be removed due to the damage it would cause my arm. I think the radio therapy is supposed to get rid of it but as it's getting bigger again I have no idea what's going to happen. My girls are the reason I keep going. Obviously I don't want to let cancer win but everything going wrong is getting me down xxx
Posts.Title: How much more can they throw at me??

Posts.Content: Thanks everyone. I'm not sure what it's classed as, all I know is I haven't had a chance to finish the first lot of treatments. I have to get 3 weeks of radio therapy and scans, I guess they'll know more then. I'm just really confused because after my operation I was told all the cancer was gone but they couldn't remove the lymph node as my nerves and veins run through it. I've been left to heal for 3 months without any scans to keep a look out. If it wasn't for my arm and hand being painful and loosing function I doubt I would even know any of this right now. All the doctors tell me different things and it's so confusing and frustrating. I have no faith in them anymore unfortunately.
Posts.Title: How much more can they throw at me??

Posts.Content: Yeah I have an appointment tomorrow with the oncologist to get things started. They said it was my own fault because I missed 2 appointments, they were made when I was in after my first op with the infection and I was told they would be cancelled and rescheduled when I was healed.
Posts.Title: How much more can they throw at me??

Posts.Content: Thanks for your help. The chemo did work, I guess the wait for the radio therapy was too long. That's the only thing I can think of. But I'm confused because she said radio therapy was only precautionary.....
Posts.Title: How much more can they throw at me??
